scripts.init: cd src && npm install && cd .. && cd cdk && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cd src && tsc && cd .. && cp src/package.json dist/package.json && cp src/package-lock.json dist/package-lock.json && cd dist && npm install --only=prod && cd ..
scripts.demo: cd client && python3 demo.py -method post && sleep 10 && python3 demo.py -method get && cd ..
scripts.clear: rm -rf src/node_modules && rm -rf cdk/cdk.out && rm -rf cdk/node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -f client/stack-data.json
scripts.all: npm run init && npm run build && npm run deploy && npm run demo && npm run destroy && npm run clear
